Title: Godspeed
Writer: Ty Franck (based on the novels by), Daniel Abraham (based on the novels by), Mark Fergus (developed by), Hawk Ostby (developed by), Dan Nowak (written for television by), Georgia Lee (story editor)
Actors: Thomas Jane, Steven Strait, Cas Anvar, Dominique Tipper
Plot: Miller devises a dangerous plan to eradicate what's left of the protomolecule on Eros.
